newsitem.title: USA: Chesapeake Biological to offer 1 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: Chesapeake Biological to offer 1 mln shares.

text.p: Chesapeake Biological Laboratories Inc filed Friday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to offer up to one million Class A common shares.
Underwriters for the offering are Ferris, Baker Watts Inc. They have an over-allotment option of up to 150,000 shares.
The Baltimore-based pharmaceutical company said proceeds from the offering will be used for general corporate purposes and to finance further expansion.
After the offering, the company will have 5,114,558 shares outstanding.
